trans-unit.source: Sliver creatures you control have double strike. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
trans-unit.target: Sliver creatures you control have double strike. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

trans-unit.source: "Their appendages are sharper than our swords and quicker than our bows."\n—Hastric, Thunian scout
trans-unit.target: "Their appendages are sharper than our swords and quicker than our bows."\n—Hastric, Thunian scout

trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
trans-unit.target: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

trans-unit.source: Ogres are driven by passion, rage, and another ogre standing behind them with a whip.
trans-unit.target: Ogres are driven by passion, rage, and another ogre standing behind them with a whip.

trans-unit.source: {G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: {G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.

trans-unit.source: In nature, not a single bone or scrap of flesh goes to waste.
trans-unit.target: In nature, not a single bone or scrap of flesh goes to waste.
